body:
Day 17 - Manga 386*
First of all, no background makes a story really bad since it portrays that the author saw it as just two people fucking and not a story about two people fucking.
Second, the characters look like fucking shit and the white background makes mistakes more visible since it is all we can focus on.
And thirdly, some of these shots look like absolute garbage. The position in which they are doesn't make their good points stand out.
Overall, shit. 
1/10.
